items.text: fullish, curving in on off, driven into the off side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: short of a length, drops into the off side from the crease
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: good length on middle at pace, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: how was that? Drifting down the leg side perhhow was that? Drifting down the leg side perhaps but Mashrafe takes the review. This could be umpire's call. Looped into middle on a length and coming on with the angle to beat the inside edge and hit the pad. No bat involved. Clipping leg stump, so on-field decision remainsps but Mashrafe takes the review. This could be umpire's call. But Bangladesh retain their review
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, punched into the covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: good length outside off, textbook defence into the covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: ripper! A scorching length ball that cuts off the seam to beat the outside edge and the off-stump as it sharply angles across him
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, drops it into cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, runs it down to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: walks across to a fuller ball and defends into the off side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, no run

items.text: tries to force a cut but is tucked up and the ball bounces over the bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: fuller this time but now he gets the width he's looking for, deftly steered to third man
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: good length on off, defended
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, 1 run

items.text: advances down the track and the ball goes off the inside of the bat towards midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: full and sliding again, finds the inside of the bat as he drills
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full, pitching outside leg, clipped through square leg for a brace
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, 2 runs

items.text: back of a length, tucked with the angle to midwicket
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: short, wide, chopped to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full, on the fifth-stump channel, punched with a closed face to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full around off, pushed into the covers
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, no run

items.text: fullish, wide outside off, and that's a top shot again. Very deftly played again with an open face to third man
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Tharanga, FOUR runs

items.text: pushed in front of point for a very quick single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dickwella, 1 run

items.text: slides in with the arm and goes into the leg side off the inside of the bat as he presses forward to defend
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run

items.text: full and tight on middle, defended down the pitch off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Tharanga, no run
